snippet: Alabama's Dre Kirkpatrick is battling Morris Claiborne of L.S.U. to be the first cornerback picked in the first round of the N.F.L. draft.
abstract: Alabama's Dre Kirkpatrick is battling Morris Claiborne of L.S.U. to be the first cornerback picked in the first round of the N.F.L. draft.

headline.main: Scouting the Draft: Alabama's Dre Kirkpatrick
